## Description

What happened? Include endpoint or page, steps to reproduce, and expected vs actual.

- API domain: `api.diwali.group`

## Logs/Output
Paste relevant API responses, `wrangler tail` output, or console errors.

## Impact
Severity and affected users/sites.
